channel.title: Lists on StarAtt
channel.description: Recent content in Lists on StarAtt

item.title: FOSS List
item.description: Everything listed work on Windows, macOS and Linux. Web Browser Vivaldi Firefox Brave General HackMD (online collaboration) LibreOffice (office suite) Syncthing (P2P synchronisation between devices) Xplorer (file explorer) nomacs (image viewer) VLC Media Player (media player) 7-Zip (file compressor and extractor) Communication Element Rocket Chat Jitsi Meet Revolt Scorewriter MuseScore Frescobaldi (Lilypond) DAW Ardour LMMS Zrythm Graphic Krita Inkscape GIMP Darktable Blender Video Shotcut Kdenlive Misc OBS Studio Rustdesk Audacity KeePass Nextcloud
